name: CRAMS™
summary: Open source risk management software platform
short_description: Open source risk management software platform delivered by experts in risk management. Products and custom solutions built on the platform automate assessment and management of risks including fraud, claims, credit, procurement, compliance, etc. CRAMS™ follows ISO/FDIS 31000:2009 – Risk Management – Principles and Guidelines and it is compatible with IEC/FDIS 31010 Risk management – Risk assessment techniques, the Committee of Sponsoring Organizations (COSO) Enterprise Risk Management – Integrated Framework (ERM). Keywords: Governance, Risk and Compliance (GRC), Operational Risk Management (ORM), Case Management
